plan: Phase 1: Research (2-3h) - Play Integrity verdicts, latency benchmarks, SLA definition.
Phase 2: Documentation (3-4h) - monitoring-strategy.md, production-readiness.md, update qa-tooling-notes.md.
Phase 3: Evidence (1h) - Extract QA-002/003 evidence from existing pipeline (POI-211/213 done).
Phase 4: Close (1h) - Update PDCA, log.jsonl, close POI-103 in board.json.
do: - Pulled metrics from research-notes; populated test-plan.json with scenarios and thresholds (FAR ≤5%, FRR ≤10%, entropy ≥0.75, DP ε≤2).
- Authored qa-tooling-notes.md for telemetry capture and Play Integrity mocks.
- Created qa-generator-plan.md scheduling synthetic data generator work (3-week plan).
- Added telemetry-proto-plan.md describing BatchTelemetry message and baseline capture.
- Captured Pixel 5 + Xiaomi 13T Pro benchmarks; added Light Ledger logcat + hash-chain evidence to POI-QA-001.
Phase 1 (Research) - DONE (2025-11-22):
[x] Review Play Integrity API docs: Accept BOTH MEETS_DEVICE_INTEGRITY and MEETS_STRONG_INTEGRITY (authenticity priority #1). Documented in sla-definition.md.
[x] Benchmark end-to-end latency: Single sample 2.17s (baseline). Bottleneck: Play Integrity API 1.4s (65%). Conservative estimates: p50≤3s, p95≤5s, p99≤10s. Requires production validation (POI-204).

[x] Define SLA: Created sla-definition.md with 7 sections (upload success ≥99%, latency targets, uptime ≥99.5%, data quality FAR/FRR/entropy, Solana confirmation ≤30s, resilience, Play Integrity verdicts).
Phase 2 (Documentation) - DONE (2025-11-22):

[x] Write monitoring-strategy.md: 8 Prometheus metrics defined (upload_attempts, latency histogram, validator_up, entropy, etc.), AlertManager rules (3 critical → PagerDuty, 4 warnings → Slack), 2 Grafana dashboards (System Overview 8 panels, Debugging 4 panels), TimescaleDB 90-day retention, Loki/CloudWatch 30-day logs.

[x] Write production-readiness.md: Quality gates (testing, security, monitoring), performance baselines (SLA targets), security requirements (TLS 1.3, OAuth secrets, CVE scan), failure modes & fallbacks (5 scenarios with runbooks), deployment checklist (blue-green, rollback plan), capacity planning (500 batch/s capacity, growth projections).

[x] Update qa-tooling-notes.md: Konkretyzacja tooling - Prometheus metrics table (8 metrics with types/labels), evidence extraction scripts (extract_play_integrity_evidence.sh, extract_validator_grpc_samples.sh, parse_latency_breakdown.sh), AlertManager config (PagerDuty + Slack webhooks), Grafana dashboard specs (panel details), synthetic generator (qa/generator/), load tester (1000 batches/24h), Play Integrity mock (unit tests), Loki LogQL queries, 3-week implementation timeline.
Phase 3 (Evidence) - DONE (2025-11-22):

[x] Extract QA-002 evidence: Created evidence/qa-002-play-integrity-success.md with 3 samples (POI-211/212/213), attestation_success_rate 100% (3/3), verified validator accepts DEVICE+STRONG verdicts. Updated test-plan.json.

[x] Extract QA-003 evidence: Created evidence/qa-003-validator-grpc-partial.md with 3 gRPC responses (STATUS_ACCEPTED), validator processing ~2ms. PARTIAL: Solana integration blocked by POI-205 (solana_tx=null). Updated test-plan.json with status='partial'.
[x] Optional QA-004: Skipped to POI-204 (resilience testing requires production monitoring stack).
Phase 4 (Close) - DONE (2025-11-22):
[x] Update PDCA do/check/act with completion details.
[x] Add final log.jsonl entry documenting POI-103 closure: All deliverables complete, acceptance criteria met, ready for handoff to POI-204.
[x] Update board.json: POI-103 status in_progress → done, closed_at 2025-11-22.
check: ✅ Play Integrity verdicts decision documented: sla-definition.md §7 (accept BOTH DEVICE+STRONG, log type for analytics).
✅ End-to-end latency benchmarked: 2.17s baseline (1 sample), p50/p95/p99 estimates documented in sla-definition.md §2.
✅ SLA defined: sla-definition.md with success ≥99%, p95 latency ≤5s, uptime ≥99.5%, data quality thresholds.
✅ monitoring-strategy.md exists: 8 Prometheus metrics, AlertManager rules, 2 Grafana dashboards, TimescaleDB/Loki retention policies (§1-4).
✅ production-readiness.md exists: Quality gates (§1), performance baselines (§2), security requirements (§3), 5 failure modes with runbooks (§4), deployment checklist (§5), capacity planning (§7).

✅ qa-tooling-notes.md updated: Concrete tooling specs (Prometheus metrics table, evidence scripts, AlertManager config, Grafana panel details, synthetic generator CLI, load tester, 3-week timeline §1-8).
✅ test-plan.json updated: QA-002 has evidence (evidence/qa-002-play-integrity-success.md, 100% success rate, 3 samples).
✅ test-plan.json updated: QA-003 has evidence (evidence/qa-003-validator-grpc-partial.md, STATUS_ACCEPTED gRPC responses, status='partial' due to POI-205 blocker).
✅ PDCA.json updated with do/check/act completion (all 4 phases DONE, all checkboxes [x] marked, completion details added).
✅ log.jsonl has final entry (POI-103 closure): ts=2025-11-22T17:00:00, all deliverables listed, handoff to POI-204 documented.
✅ Dokument test-plan z kryteriami: test-plan.json updated with QA-002/003 evidence (QA-001 done earlier by Kai, QA-004 deferred to POI-204).
✅ Lista automatyzacji/narzędzi: qa-tooling-notes.md (8 sections with concrete tools), qa-generator-plan.md, telemetry-proto-plan.md.
✅ Rekomendacje monitoringu i alertów: monitoring-strategy.md (metrics/alerts/dashboards), production-readiness.md (deployment/runbooks), sla-definition.md (targets).
act: - Hand off to POI-204 (QA Tooling implementation): build tools from POI-103 framework (synthetic generator, telemetry stream, Grafana dashboards).
- Monitor production uploads for 1-2 days: validate Play Integrity success rate ≥99%, batch latency p95 ≤30s.
- Collaborate with Nodus on POI-203 (CloudHSM provisioning): ensure monitoring covers HSM metrics.
- Plan POI-206 (Attestation Integration): use POI-103 quality gates as acceptance criteria.
- Before POI-209 (Deployment): verify all POI-103 quality gates met in staging environment.

blockers_resolved: POI-213 done → TLS validator operational, Play Integrity working
POI-211/212 done → Android client ready for evidence collection
